panels.description:
RAM Info including capacity of VMs that are in a queue. 

Required = Usage + Migration queue
panels.title: RAM +  VMs in queue

targets.expr: count(vmware2openstack_migration_status >= 7 and vmware2openstack_migration_status < 13 and vmware2openstack_migration_status != 8 and vmware2openstack_migration_status != 11) or vector(0)

panels.description: Annual savings based on VPCU price

targets.expr: ((sum(vmware2openstack_vm_cpu and vmware2openstack_migration_status >= 13) * 0.012644) - (sum(vmware2openstack_vm_cpu and vmware2openstack_migration_status >= 13) *0.00454)) * 730 or on() vector(0)

((sum(vmware2openstack_vm_cpu and vmware2openstack_migration_status >= 13) * 0.012644) - (sum(vmware2openstack_vm_cpu and vmware2openstack_migration_status >= 13) *0.003700)) * 730 * 12 or on() vector(0)

panels.title: Annual savings

targets.expr: ((sum(vmware2openstack_vm_cpu and vmware2openstack_migration_status >= 13) * 0.012634) - (sum(vmware2openstack_vm_cpu and vmware2openstack_migration_status >= 13) *0.004400)) * 730 * 12 or on() vector(0)
count(vmware2openstack_migration_status >= 7 and vmware2openstack_migration_status < 13 and vmware2openstack_migration_status != 8) or vector(0)

panels.description: List of Migrated and Ready for migration VMs
panels.title: All VMs
